A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Entertaining\, but not impressive.  Totally screwed up Luke's character\, all of a sudden he wants to end the Jedi?  Really?  Disney is really allowing these movies to get so screwed up.  Snoke?  Who the F is Snoke?  He's the Supreme Leader\, with massive power\, but gets killed too quickly.  I loved Rose\, but her story line with Finn was such a boring waste of time\, way to SJW (Rich people are evil).  Laura Derns Character was empty with no real substance.  General Leah should have died in the vacuum of space\, but magically she can use the force now.  It was entertaining (had I never seen any other Star Wars before)\,
